Test Cases: Account No field accepts valid numbers
Test Steps: 1) Enter valid account number in the "Account No" field
Expected Result: Manger moved to the next field successfully without error message
Actual Result: Manger moved to the next field successfully without error message

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to the next field
1) Do not enter a value in "Account No" field
Expected Result: An error message "Account No must not be blank" must shown
Actual Result: An error message "Account No must not be blank" shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to next field

Test Cases: Account No can't contains special characters
Test Steps: 1) Enter any special characters the "Account No" field
Expected Result: An error message "Special characters are not allowed" must shown
Actual Result: An error message "Special characters are not allowed" shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to the next field
1) Enter any characters the "Account No" field
Expected Result: An error message "Characters are not allowed" must shown
Actual Result: An error message "Characters are not allowed" shown

Test Steps: 2) Press TAB and move to the next field

Test Cases: Manager/ Customer can view mini statement page entering valid "Account No"
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Account No"
Expected Result: The manager/ customer successfully can view mini statement page
Actual Result: The website fail and gives an error message "Connection failed: Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO)"

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Submit" button

Test Cases: Manger can reset the Account No field
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Account No" associated with the manager
Expected Result: All the data entered must be deleted

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Reset" button

Test Cases: Nothing happen when clicking on reset button without entering any data
Test Steps: 1) Leave the "Account No" field empty
2) Click on the "Reset" button
